Job Description:

 

InfoDrive Solutions is seeking an experienced Salesforce Developer to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing customizations, enhancements, and integrations for our clients using the Salesforce platform. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in software development and experience with Salesforce development.

 

Responsibilities:

• Design and develop customizations, enhancements, and integrations on the Salesforce platform

• Collaborate with clients and team members to identify business requirements and develop technical solutions

• Develop and maintain custom code using Apex, Visualforce, and Lightning Web Components

• Create and maintain integrations with third-party systems using REST and SOAP APIs

• Participate in code reviews and ensure that all code meets industry standards and best practices

• Troubleshoot and debug issues as they arise

• Provide support for production issues and ensure timely resolution

• Stay current with Salesforce platform updates and new features

• Participate in project planning and estimation

 

Qualifications:

• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field

• 3+ years of experience in Salesforce development

• Proficient in Apex, Visualforce, and Lightning Web Components

• Experience with Salesforce integrations using REST and SOAP APIs

• Strong understanding of object-oriented programming concepts

• Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills

• Strong communication and collaboration skills

• Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple projects simultaneously

• Salesforce certifications, such as Platform Developer I and II, are a plus

 

If you meet the above qualifications and are looking to take your Salesforce development career to the next level, we encourage you to apply to this exciting opportunity at InfoDrive Solutions.
